caseSubject: Contempt of Court/Non-compliance of Court Order
caseTitle: Shehri -Citizens for a Better Environment & others v. Murad Ali Shah
tagline: Application for initiation of Contempt of Court proceedings against the Chief Minster, Sindh for non-compliance of orders with regard to the payment of compensation and rehabilitation of affectees who were dispossessed from Gujar Nallah, Orangi Nallah and Mehmoodabad Nallah, Karachi.
